Name: Wonhon: Prologue
About the game: Wonhon: Prologue is a prequel chapter to the main game, a hardcore tactical stealth action thriller set in Korea in the beginning of 20th century. Being returned from the dead, you have only one weapon: the ability to steal the life force from living creatures, turn into a ghost and possess them. Since youâ€™re not protected by anything and can be killed with one shot, you need to move covertly and plan every step. The high complexity of the game makes you monitor each of your actions closely, since the punishment for being caught is a one-bullet death. Play as a girl who can turn into a vengeful ghost to assassinate her enemies; Conquer difficult situations when you are outnumbered and can be killed by one shot; Balance between stealth and violence, finding your own unique way to complete your task;
